alewi kalamanakaruta athwana wasi [sanskaranaya] karmanthaye aarthika wyuhaya handuna ganima weladapola khanda/ wargikaranayan handuna ganima ilakka weladapola khandaya handuna ganima pradhana paribhogikayin handuna ganimata alewikarana samikshana haraha pudgala lakshana, gathi pawathum haduna ganima ha ee aashrayen pudgala akruthi nirmanaya kirima tharagakaruwan ha tharagakari bhanda ha sewawan handuna ganimata nawa bhanda ha sewawan nishpadanayata sarwa ha kshudra aarthika parisaraya piriksuma thulin anagatha wasidayaka awastha ha gatalu handuna ganimata aayathanaye shakthin ha durwala than handuna ganimata bhanda ha sewawanhi warga namayan sambandayen paribhogika athdakim ha aakalpa piriksimath alewikarana upaya marga nirnaya kirimath wikunum kriyawaliya anekuth prawardhana kriyawalin ha sambandha kirimata ( pracharanaya, wikunum diriganwim, mahajana sambandhatha godanagima aadi ) sthirasarawu tharagakari wasiyak goda nagimata anagathaye warganamayange thathwaya nigamanaya kirima ha alewikarana salasum nirmana kriyawaliyata dayaka wima prathicharata walata anukulawa nishpadana kriyawaliya prathiwyuhagatha kirimata dayaka wima dirghakalina upayakramika wasi [sanskaranaya] mema paddhathi magin tharangakari wasiyak nirmanaya kala haki we.
